import { FormEvent, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { createUserWithEmailAndPassword, getAuth, signInWithEmailAndPassword} from 'firebase/auth'; import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; export const CreateAccount = () => { const auth = getAuth(); const history = useHistory(); const [ email, setEmail ] = useState(''); const [ password, setPassword ] = useState(''); const [ cpassword, setCPassword ] = useState(''); const [ pwEqual, setPwEqual] = useState(true); const handleSubmit = async (event: FormEvent) => { event.preventDefault() if(password != cpassword){ setPwEqual(false); } try { const userCredential = await createUserWithEmailAndPassword(auth, email, password); } catch (error:any) { console.log( error.message); } }; return(
Create an account
Please signup to continue to Pillmate
setEmail(e.target.value)} value={email} style={{width: '25vw', height: '49px'}}/>
setPassword(e.target.value)} value={password} style={{width: '25vw', height: '49px'}}/>
setCPassword(e.target.value)} value={cpassword} style={{width: '25vw', height: '49px'}}/>
{pwEqual ?
:
password not matching
}
); }
